result.title: Perception - Machine Learning
result.description:
The perception team is a center piece of the Autel’s ADAS engineering organization, which targets to develop cutting-edge technologies and machine learning models to enable our top class ADAS solutions. We are looking for a talented machine learning engineer/scientist to lead the development of advanced computer vision and machine learning techniques for the perception system.

Job Responsibilities:
* Investigate and develop computer vision algorithms and ML models (e.g.
detection, segmentation, etc.) for the perception system.
* Lead to develop and maintain ML frameworks, APIs and tools that
enable a fast research to production lifecycle
* Optimization of neural networks through pruning, quantization etc.
* Collaborate with perception software team on deployment of the ML
models on the devices
Skills and Qualifications:
* BS, MS or PhD in computer science, or related fields
* Expertise in deep learning, especially computer vision
* Proficiency in Python or C++
* Proficiency with one
